data: {"concept_id": "drive", "concept_name": "Character Drive", "type": "element", "definition": "Engine that turns desire into action and habit—the patterned push that keeps a character moving.", "scope_notes": "Surfaces as Declare/Demonstrate/Doubt/Defy; potency scales Low→Medium→High. Track through beats and consequences.", "axes": "mode|potency", "axis_values": "declare|demonstrate|doubt|defy | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "decision_style|beats|body_logic|backstory|tension", "conflicts_with": "static_motivation|empty_posture|resetting_consequences|plot_puppetry", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_drive_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_drive_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "signal_id": "sig_declare", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "declare", "description": "Drive put on the record via vow, pledge, ‘from now on,’ or private mantra.", "detection_hint": "Look for explicit commitment language or naming the goal.", "false_positive_risks": "Boasts with no behavioral follow-through.", "minimal_example": "“I’m going to Harvard Law.” / “I will carry it to Mordor.”", "counterexample": "A hype line no scene honors later.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "signal_id": "sig_demonstrate", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "demonstrate", "description": "Drive shown in action: repeated effort, sacrifice, risk, consistency.", "detection_hint": "Track choices that cost something; look for persistent behavior.", "false_positive_risks": "One grand gesture with no ripple.", "minimal_example": "Training montage grind; showing up early and staying late.", "counterexample": "A single late-night scene with zero after-effects.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "signal_id": "sig_doubt", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "doubt", "description": "Hesitation and self-questioning that complicate pursuit without canceling it.", "detection_hint": "Pauses, reversals, self-sabotage, asking for reassurance.", "false_positive_risks": "Vague moodiness unconnected to decisions.", "minimal_example": "Draft-delete-redraft; asking ‘What if I can’t?’ then trying anyway.", "counterexample": "Sad vibes with identical behavior.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "signal_id": "sig_defy", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "defy", "description": "Refusal to accept limits; pushes back against rules, roles, or gatekeepers.", "detection_hint": "No/Not-this lines; broken patterns; civil disobedience; walk-outs.", "false_positive_risks": "Edgy posture that doesn’t change options.", "minimal_example": "Volunteering for a sister; tearing up the contract; building the suit in secret.", "counterexample": "Snark with no consequence.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "signal_id": "sig_potency_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Quiet flicker: private rituals, soft restlessness, reversible micro-steps.", "detection_hint": "Look for daydreams, saved articles, small detours; low publicness/cost.", "false_positive_risks": "Atmosphere only; no link to choices.", "minimal_example": "Keeping an unsent letter; taking the long way past the clinic.", "counterexample": "Aesthetic props that never matter.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "signal_id": "sig_potency_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Steady push: voiced wants, concrete steps, resistance faced, some risk.", "detection_hint": "Actions that alter schedules/relationships; visible bargaining and persistence.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy activity with no consequences.", "minimal_example": "Applying, training, speaking up, trying again after a miss.", "counterexample": "Montage of tasks with total reset.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "signal_id": "sig_potency_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "All-in pursuit: obsession, sacrifice, no Plan B; bridges burned.", "detection_hint": "Public vows; irreversible acts; law/role defiance; single-minded focus.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle without lasting change.", "minimal_example": "Burning the letter on the porch while neighbors watch; walking away from safety.", "counterexample": "Explosive scene followed by status quo.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "misconception_id": "static_motivation", "description": "Talks about wants but never converts to action or habit.", "tells": "Speeches with zero follow-through.", "likely_causes": "Confusing motivation with drive.", "corrective_feedback": "Force one demonstrated act with a cost next scene.", "micro_drill": "Add a consequence-bearing action to the speech.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "misconception_id": "empty_posture", "description": "Defiant tone without changed options or risk.", "tells": "Snark, swagger, or ‘tough’ lines.", "likely_causes": "Style over substance.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie defiance to a door that actually opens/closes.", "micro_drill": "Replace posture with an action that changes stakes.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "misconception_id": "resetting_consequences", "description": "Choices evaporate next scene; no memory or cost.", "tells": "Injury/relationship/decision resets.", "likely_causes": "Fear of complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Carry at least one cost forward three scenes.", "micro_drill": "List 3 fallout items and make one recur.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"concept_id": "drive", "misconception_id": "plot_puppetry", "description": "Choices serve outline, not character drive.", "tells": "Sudden OOC flips for twists.", "likely_causes": "Forgetting pre-signals.", "corrective_feedback": "Pre-signal with habit/pressure; let consequences stick.", "micro_drill": "Insert a pre-beat that forecasts the choice.", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_drive_identify_mode_potency", "concept_id": "drive", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each passage by Drive Mode (declare/demonstrate/doubt/defy) and Potency (low/medium/high). Justify with one specific cue.", "expected_features": "Correct mode+potency; cites observable signal; ties to consequence/publicness/cost.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels with sharp evidence and cost/publicness noted", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels or evidence off; vibes-only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Include boast-without-behavior and spectacle-with-reset as traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Spot cue 2) Choose mode 3) Gauge potency by cost/publicness/reversibility", "variation_axes": "mode|potency", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_drive_escalate_deescalate", "concept_id": "drive", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Escalate or de-escalate the same moment from Low↔Med↔High by editing stakes, resistance, publicness, and cost.", "expected_features": "Edits shift reversibility and consequences; rhythm changes accordingly.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear potency shift + coherent beat rhythm", "Meets": "Some shift; partially coherent", "Developing": "More adjectives, same stakes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Adjective inflation.", "hint_steps": "1) Add/remove resistance 2) Change audience 3) Add/remove sacrifice", "variation_axes": "stakes|resistance|publicness", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_drive_trace_chain", "concept_id": "drive", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Arrange Declare→Demonstrate→Defy with Doubt beats slotted where they plausibly occur; annotate consequences.", "expected_features": "Causal chain intact; doubt complicates but doesn’t cancel; consequences persist.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Chain reads inevitable; fallout sticks", "Meets": "Causal with minor gaps", "Developing": "List-like; resets"}, "distractor_strategy": "Coincidental outcomes with no link.", "hint_steps": "1) Place vow 2) Show proof 3) Mark pushback 4) Land cost", "variation_axes": "sequence|cause_effect", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_drive_fix_posture", "concept_id": "drive", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Replace empty posture with a concrete action that actually changes options.", "expected_features": "Action alters stakes or choices; tone follows function.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Change in options is visible and sticky", "Meets": "Some effect", "Developing": "Tone change only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Clever lines with zero effect.", "hint_steps": "1) Identify gate/limit 2) Take an action that moves it 3) Name the new option", "variation_axes": "function|stakes", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_drive_1", "concept_id": "drive", "axis_value": "declare|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "“I’m going to fight this company.” She circles a date on the calendar.", "context_tags": "public_vow|stakes", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_drive_2", "concept_id": "drive", "axis_value": "demonstrate|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "He practices in the empty lot every dawn for a month.", "context_tags": "habit|sacrifice", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_drive_3", "concept_id": "drive", "axis_value": "doubt|low", "label": "strong", "text": "He drafts the text, deletes it, then leaves the phone face down and studies anyway.", "context_tags": "hesitation|persistence", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_drive_4", "concept_id": "drive", "axis_value": "defy|high", "label": "strong", "text": "She tears the contract onstage and walks into the lights.", "context_tags": "irreversible|public", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_drive_5", "concept_id": "drive", "axis_value": "demonstrate|high", "label": "strong", "text": "He sells the car to fund the trip and tells no one, then books a one-way ticket.", "context_tags": "sacrifice|no_plan_b", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_drive_weak_1", "concept_id": "drive", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "He says he’ll change, then everything’s the same next scene.", "context_tags": "reset", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_drive_weak_2", "concept_id": "drive", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Edgy one-liners, no choices altered.", "context_tags": "posture_only", "source_file": "Character Drive.md", "source_md5": "5cf0ee7e06cf6f9939b96786a5c9b66c", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:28:55.051508Z"}
